name: Cats Make You Smarter!
description: Meet 50 hand-drawn, funny cats and let them make you smarter by matching 2, 3, 4 or 5 of them on a board in 5 game modes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 90 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1 Ghz or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Storage: 90 MB available space Sound Card: OpenAL supported sound card
